column4: How do I remove the password protection in bios in order to install ubuntu?
open the box and cap the jumper for your bios reset
you'll need to look for which jumper it is in your user manual
how do i tell? i have 128mB of video ram and it's ati
if it's a radeon you can install the fglx drivers. Otherwise you have to use the open source ones
i found it: 128mB ati mobility radeon[r]  x700
then use the getting started guide
how do i know if i'm using an NForce2-based motherboard?
I'd assume you don't. If you run into trouble you can change that part of the Xorg.conf
you can kill the process then
